messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a number of [REDACTED] have stampeded into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a whoop of wire eating mammals have stampeded into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near April Town Alpha, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's bots/animals has developed moderate level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
